stack:stack.stack:description: Setup the DHCP server for the cluster
stack:stack.stack:script:
/usr/bin/systemctl enable dhcpd isc-dhcp-server
/opt/stack/bin/stack report dhcpd | /opt/stack/bin/stack report script | sh

rm /etc/dhcpd.conf ln -s /etc/dhcp/dhcpd.conf /etc/dhcpd.conf
touch /var/lib/dhcp/db/dhcpd.leases chmod 644 /var/lib/dhcp/db/dhcpd.leases chown dhcpd.nogroup /var/lib/dhcp/db/dhcpd.leases
